titleStmt.title: Articles to be performed by vertue of our commission of sale annexed, touching forrests, parkes, and chases.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Instructions to the Kings surveyors concerning sale of wood and care of the forests. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
